text: Tara juna manisaharu aphno palanaharasamga dara mandachan, tinaka nimti jannataharu (svargaharu) chan jasako munibata saritaharu pravahita chan (ra) tyasama tiniharu sadhaim rahanechan. Yo allahabata asala karma garneharula'i puraskara ho allahako tarphabata, ra je jati allahakaham cha, tyo dherai ramro cha
